div.h3: 244 Cases of COVID-19 in Northern Kentucky; Don’t Touch Your Face
div.p: As of 4:30 p.m. Thursday, April 16, 12 additional cases of COVID-19 have been identified in Northern Kentucky, for 244 total cases.

a.data-email-subject: Check out this news article for Kenton County, KY
